poem:
Title: "A Politician's Promise"

Beneath the proscenium of power, 
the orator preaches art's resurgence.
In the spectral light of his promises—
Keir's canvas, brushed with crafty words,
Blooms on the barren stage.
Yet, the tillage of truth lingers:
Will the seed of an uttered vow 
Fall on fertile or fallow action?
Tales as old as time,
Custom, scarce as fidelity's echo.
